arts.ttl: Burnley vs Leeds United: Premier League Preview, Gameweek 8, 2025
arts.sum: Burnley host Leeds United in a Saturday clash at Turf Moor, with both sides aiming to achieve the same goal for the season - survival - a win on Saturday seems a must for both Scott Parker and Daniel Farke, both sets of fans will settle for nothing less. Jaidon Anthony currently has four Premier League goals and 1 assist to his name and will be vitally important to Burnley getting win at Turf Moor this weekend.
